pr_title: Migrate jpa injection ejb in war fat

timeline.message:
Migrate JPA FAT for Injection into EJBInWAR to Open Liberty

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

Refactor JPA Injection Bucket to Minimize server restarts.

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

Address review comments for OLGH #15162

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: The database.xml convention is one of the reasons for the NPE when running in SOE builds. Can we just copy this over to server.xml and delete?
timeline.author: dazey3

replies.bodyText: This applies to ALL the database.xml's, not just this one but I wont paste it for each
replies.author: dazey3

timeline.message:
Remove use of database.xml with JPA Injection bucket.

Signed-off-by: Joe Grassel <jgrassel@us.ibm.com>
